thread.title: Tony Dovolani Hints He’ll Return For ‘DWTS’ Season 24 After Family Tragedy
thread.title_full: Tony Dovolani Hints He’ll Return For ‘DWTS’ Season 24 After Family Tragedy

author: Ariana Romero
title: Tony Dovolani Hints He’ll Return For ‘DWTS’ Season 24 After Family Tragedy
text:
A photo posted by Tony dovolani (@tonydovolani) on Feb 2, 2017 at 3:19pm PST 
Tony’s Season 7 partner Susan Lucci guest-hosted Hallmark’s morning show Home & Family this week and invited the pro on today, January 3, People reports. 
The pals’ conversation quickly turned to DWTS ’s upcoming season — and the pro, 43, had a huge emotional reveal to make. 
“It was time to take a little bit of a break,” the Season 15 champ says. 
“My sister actually went through breast cancer. She beat it.” A photo posted by Tony dovolani (@tonydovolani) on Jan 15, 2017 at 3:03pm PST 
Although Tony’s sister is healthy now, his family still suffered a shocking number of hardships over the last year. A photo posted by Tony dovolani (@tonydovolani) on Oct 16, 2016 at 7:18am PDT 
“She went through a couple weeks of chemo and six weeks of radiation, so it was a long one,” Susan’s partner reveals. 
“Unfortunately, my aunt was not so lucky.” A photo posted by Tony dovolani (@tonydovolani) on Oct 16, 2016 at 6:39am PDT 
“I had a few misfortunes happen in our family,” Tony admits. “But we are at the other side of it, which I’m really happy [about].” 
The former DWTS winner is so happy it sounds like he’ll be chasing the Mirrorball Trophy in no time. Jan 17, 2017 at 4:01am PST 
“I miss Dancing , of course I love the show,” he says of the ABC competition. 
“And of course I might do another season.” 
This is welcomed news as a few DWTS favorites have confirmed they’re skipping Season 24. 
Tony’s pal Maks confirmed he’ll be too busy with new daddy duties to return to the dancefloor. 
Derek Hough is also out of Season 24 ahead of his Move Tour with sis Julianne, whose DWTS future is still up in the air. Jan 21, 2017 at 2:37am PST 
Do you think Tony will come back this spring? Tell us in the comments section! 
Dancing With the Stars returns Monday, March 20, at 8 p.m. ET on ABC.
